title: Unlock phone after remotely locking it.
content:
I lost my phone a few days ago and remotely locked it with Find My Device.
My phone was returned by a kind stranger today. I unlock it with my fingerprint and PIN, then after a few second the "Locked by Find My Device" screen returns and I can't do anything.
Surely my fingerprint and PIN should tell the device it's back with it's rightful owner. I cannot figure out how to fix this.
Any advice appreciated please.
